message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a price closer to $11,000.  I believe this is still a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I can't go any lower than $10,000.
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. Can you consider that?
